author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0151 examples should use a share lib
Pig and streaming JARs should be in a share lib directory.
This would show the sharelib functionality and it will bundle
streaming/pig JARs only once (instead once per workflow app using them)

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0150 LauncherMapper should do a friendly display of the classpath of the JVM

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0149 create sharelib module with Pig/Streaming JARs
Adding a sharelib module that bundles streaming/pig JARs used by Oozie build.
Updated assemblies to create a sharelib TAR.GZ file

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0119 support for user() EL function in coord apps.
Added coord:user() EL function to all coordinator EL function groups.

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0131 add an embedded tomcat in Oozie distribution
Adding release notes entry and Tomcat to the license section.
